title: The great O Toole
author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.
publisher: Printed [by Edward Allde] for Henry Gosson,
notes: "In memorabilis effigies", A1v, signed: Iohn Taylor.
Running title reads: To the honour of Otoole.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
With a facsimile portrait of O'Toole. Print show-through.
